message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.  What do you say?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,500?
